subject: Damaged TravelMate Compact
body:
Hello,

I bought the TravelMate Compact for a trip to Europe. I purchased it on October 1, 2025.

During my flight back, my checked luggage was mishandled and the hair dryer case was crushed. The folding mechanism is now broken and won't lock in place.

I understand this might not be covered but wanted to check. Serial: TMC-2025-55678.

Receipt attached.

Jennifer Williams
789 Beach Drive
Miami, FL 33139
305-555-0277

metadata.reason: Damage from airline baggage handling is explicitly excluded
